meanings.definition: relating to or forming the lithosphere
meanings.sent1: The lithospheric layer of the earth is solid and strong.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the lithospheric plates to understand the Earth's structure.
meanings.sent3: The lithospheric rocks decided to have a party underground.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the lithospheric crust.
meanings.sent5: The lithospheric nature of the ground made it difficult to dig through.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the rigid outer part of the earth consisting of the crust and upper mantle
meanings.sent1: The lithospheric boundary marks the division between the crust and mantle.
meanings.sent2: Volcanic activity often originates in the lithospheric layer.
meanings.sent3: The lithospheric pizza was topped with molten lava.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as solid as the lithospheric structure of the planet.
meanings.sent5: The lithospheric composition of the Earth's surface is crucial for life to thrive.
